    • Method Detail

      • login

        public com.uno.zoo.dto.UserInfo login(com.uno.zoo.dto.UserLogIn user)
                               throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException,
                                      java.sql.SQLException,
                                      java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Accesses the database and retrieves the user information from valid credentials are provided. User_Status column values are defined as follows:
        0: regular user (not admin), active
        1: admin user, active
        2: inactive user (will not appear in user table and user is unable to log in)
        Parameters:
        user - UserLogIn information
        Returns:
        UserInfo completely filled out if logged in. If not logged in, object parameters will be null except UserInfo.setLoggedIn(boolean) will be false
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

        java.lang.NumberFormatException - When converting item id from String to int

        Parameters:

        fileName -
        decodedImage -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getImageFromFileSystemAsBase64String

        public java.lang.String getImageFromFileSystemAsBase64String(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the image from the file system as a Base64 encoded string.
        You will need to add the base64 prefix before it will display: "data:image/jpg;base64," + base64EncodedString
        Parameters:
        filePath - Full path to image, including image name. Use Paths.get(HOMEPAGE_IMAGE_FOLDER_FIRST_PART, HOMEPAGE_IMAGE_FILE_NAME);
        Returns:
        Base64 encoded string without the prefix "data:image/jpg;base64,"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When reading image from file system.
